etcd.json.description: etcd sample Grafana dashboard with Prometheus

targets.expr:
clamp_max((sum(increase(heplify_method_response{target_name=~"$tn", method="INVITE", response="200"}[15m])) * 100) / 
(sum(increase(heplify_method_response{target_name=~"$tn", method="INVITE", response="INVITE"}[15m])) - 
(sum(increase(heplify_method_response{target_name=~"$tn", method="INVITE", response=~"3.*|401|407"}[15m])) or sum(up) * 0)), 100)

clamp_max((sum(increase(heplify_method_response{target_name=~"$tn", method="INVITE", response=~"200|480|486|600|603"}[15m])) * 100) / 
(sum(increase(heplify_method_response{target_name=~"$tn", method="INVITE", response="INVITE"}[15m])) - 
(sum(increase(heplify_method_response{target_name=~"$tn", method="INVITE", response=~"3.*|401|407"}[15m])) or sum(up) * 0)), 100)

clamp_max(((sum(increase(heplify_method_response{target_name=~"$tn", method="REGISTER", response=~"4.*|5.*|6.*"}[15m])) - 
sum(increase(heplify_method_response{target_name=~"$tn", method="REGISTER", response=~"401|402|407"}[15m]))) * 100) / 
(sum(increase(heplify_method_response{target_name=~"$tn", method="REGISTER", response="REGISTER"}[15m]))), 100)

etcd.json.title: etcd
